displayables.Text: {0} What are you most self-conscious about?
Everybody : Show the most embarrassing picture of someone in this game. People showing the least embarrasing picture drink.

Everybody: What is the most expensive thing you have stolen? The highest value drinks 3 times. (Bad!)

Everyone smiles! The game continue as usual. When someone stops smiling, that person drinks. (And the others can stop smiling)
